description: Numerator of Sum_{k=1..n} H(k)/k, where H(k) is k-th harmonic number.
comments: First column of A027447.Numerators of the binomial transform of (-1)^n/(n+1)^3. The matrix a[i,j] below is the product of the binomial matrix and the matrix with general term binomial(i,j)(-1)^(i-j)/(i+1)^3. - _Paul Barry_, Aug 06 2004From _Alexander Adamchuk_, Jan 02 2007 [edited by _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Mar 08 2015]: (Start)Also a(n) is a numerator of S(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} H(k)/k, where H(k) is the k-th harmonic number, H(k) = Sum_{i=1..k} 1/i = A001008(k)/A002805(k).S(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} H(k)/k = 1/2*(H(n)^2 + H(n,2)), where H(n,2) = Sum_{i=1..n} 1/i^2 = A007406(n)/A007407(n).p divides a(p-1) and a(p-2) for prime p>3. a(n) is prime for n = {2, 7, 26, 31, 43, 53, 68, 80, 91, 123, 175, 236, 458, ...}. (End)
